title: Lost skin
body:
Hi everyone , 

 Can someone help me figure out some how I lost some of skin  in my acc.
 And Yesterday I rr 3 of Champions skin  and I got a new Wander Sivir but  Some how It didnt unlock that skin for me yet???

replies.body: i need skin ali STar Please

I looked into this for you but was unable to find Spectacular Sivir.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can dig deeper into this for you.  We'll review your case and get back to you as soon as we can!
